snippet.title: Running With Rifles Review - Worth a Buy?
snippet.description:
RUNNING WITH RIFLES is a top-down tactical shooter with open world RPG elements. In RWR, you join the ranks of an army as a common soldier, just like the thousands around you. - But is it Worth a buy?

Steam Store:
http://store.steampowered.com/app/270150/

Donation Page
https://www.patreon.com/worthabuy

My Other Channel
https://www.youtube.com/Mackscorner

Worth A Buy Group
http://steamcommunity.com/groups/worthabuy

Worth A Buy Curator
http://store.steampowered.com/curator/6923845/

Steam
http://steamcommunity.com/profiles/76561197993507603
